Mutants with incredible strength make the most powerful necrohulks. These necrohulk smashers are so swollen with biological and alchemical muscle enhancements that they can simply pound their way through enemies. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 36 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 [Necrohulk Smasher](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2365) **Source** [Pathfinder #185: A Taste of Ashes](/Sources.aspx?ID=188) pg. 87 **Perception** +25; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +32, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +27 **Str** +9 **Dex** +4 **Con** +6 **Int** -4 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +4 --- **AC** 36 **Fort** +29 **Ref** +23 **Will** +26 **HP** 345 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) , regeneration 15 (deactivated by [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Weaknesses** slashing 15 **Alchemical Cartridge** ([alchemical](/Traits.aspx?ID=6)) Critical hits rupture the necrohulk's alchemical cartridge. The first time the necrohulk takes a critical hit, it loses its regeneration. The second time it takes a critical hit, it takes 15 [persistent acid damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) that it can't heal unless the cartridge is stitched back into place.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** fist +30 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d10+15 bludgeoning and [Improved Knockback](/Feats.aspx?ID=470) **Ranged** rock +25 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 4d10+15 bludgeoning **Alchemical Amplification** ([Alchemical](/Traits.aspx?ID=6)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Effect** The necrohulk draws upon alchemical stores to push its body into overdrive. It becomes [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) for 1d4 rounds. It can use this extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike. **[Rend](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=30)** fist **Smashing Blow** The necrohulk smasher makes a fist Strike. If it hits, the necrohulk smashes the target into the floor or nearby wall. The target takes an additional 6d10 bludgeoning damage, depending on its DC 33 Fortitude save.
**Critical Success** The target takes half of the additional damage.
**Success** The target takes half the additional damage and is [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).
**Failure** The target takes full additional damage, is stunned 3, and knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).
**Critical Failure** The target takes double the additional damage, is stunned 3, and knocked prone. **[Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=38)**
Undead Fleshwarps Muscular [fleshwarps](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=31) are the most common ancestry used to make necrohulk smashers. These people have often already experienced lives of rejection or exclusion before the final indignity of unwanted reanimation.
name: Necrohulk Smasher
